p.span: SIF 2021 created relevant knowledge with the contribution of international high-level experts. Participants shared their understanding and visions for the future of education and contributed with ideas for redefining approaches to learning and equipping them with a new attention to values.
The 2021 debate highlighted ideas and proposals for the future of education under the following main themes: DIGITAL AND GREEN REVOLUTION – MICRO-CREDENTIALS – SHARING IS CARING.

div.class: wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_left wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_fadeInRight fadeInRight
wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_center wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_fadeInLeft fadeInLeft

p.span: The ongoing attack on Ukraine forces the SIF community to adapt to the war scenario and calls for discussing new challenges related to building and maintaining peace. This year’s debate will therefore focus on the role of education as a cornerstone of peace and revive the already consolidated attention of SIF participants to ethical values in education. In addition, this year’s debate will explore how the development of a digital mindset can become an engine to take technical and vocational education for peace to the next level.

div.style: background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.01);background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat;background-attachment: fixed;background-size: cover;padding-top: 0px;padding-bottom: 0px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: -35px

rs-slide.h2:
For all these reasons, it is our great pleasure to invite relevant stakeholders to TVET-ALLIANCE SUMMIT - 2022.
The event is organised by the members of TVET-ALLIANCE in partnership with the European Training Foundation and with the operational efforts of some specific members such as: IVETA, AER, ENNI, Skillman and EAPRIL.
Twenty-four members will meet in Florence, Italy, on 5-6 April 2021 to finalise the outcomes of SIF 2021 and to set the vision of the Alliance on which SIF 2022 will be based.
Participants will take the first results of the Alliance's efforts and discuss their further upgrading to make the Alliance stronger!
A statement will also be drafted to help shape the future of TVET as a responsive sector, able to react to megatrends, even anticipate them, and create an inclusive system for all that leaves no one behind.
The Summit will take place in the fascinating surroundings of Florence.

div.style: background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.01);background-image: url(https://skillman.eu/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/WIP-1.png);background-position: top;background-repeat: no-repeat;background-attachment: scroll;background-size: auto;padding-top: 0px;padding-bottom: 0px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px

span.span: The Summit is a part of a long journey where the participants work together to achieve common goals aiming at improving education and TVET.

The participants share a strong commitment in co-shaping an inclusive, resilient and sustainable society, where TVET represents a pillar for innovation in curricula development and designing the “society of tomorrow”.

iframe.title: YouTube video player
iframe.allow: accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share

i.b: The Skillman Network is a non-governmental organisation based in the EU and engaged in the TVET domain to design and distribute solutions that facilitate the implementation of the work-based-learning approach to skills mismatch for a worldwide community of practitioners, researchers and institutions.

p.span: Listen to the introduction by Andreas Schleicher, Director, Education and Skills, OECD, who invites delegates to SIF 2021 to discuss some very important aspects that make up the thinking of the Skillman International Forum and which will be valorised at the Alliance Summmit:

rs-layer-wrap.rs-layer:
The Villa is surrounded by an estate of tall cypress trees, standing guard over vineyards and olive groves.
Nearby are many lovely Tuscan towns like Siena, San Gimignano, and of course Florence.
The garden side has an elegant cloister, enriched by Tuscan-style columns, and all the doors and the windows are decorated with pure Renaissance-style stones”.

iframe.title: il poggiale 4

rs-layer-wrap.style: position: absolute; display: block; pointer-events: auto; left: 219.5px; top: 218px; z-index: 11; visibility: visible; perspective: 601px;

rs-layer.style: z-index: 11; font-family: Roboto; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-decoration: none; white-space: normal; width: 447px; height: 133px; min-height: 0px; min-width: 0px; max-height: none; max-width: none; text-align: left; line-height: 24px; letter-spacing: 0px; font-weight: 500; font-size: 16px; backdrop-filter: none; filter: none; transform-origin: 50% 50%; opacity: 1; transform: translate(1px, 1px); visibility: visible;

rs-layer-wrap.rs-layer:
The central courtyard, along with its well, is probably the most ancient part of the villa; several embellishments and extensions were carried out in later times.
Its exterior dates back to the XVI century, with its nice Renaissance loggia and elegant door and window framings finished in Serena stone.
The elegant rooms in the relais hotel main floor overlook the Chianti hills and have antique furniture and fabrics coming from Tuscan artisan weaving factories.

rs-layer-wrap.style: position: absolute; display: block; pointer-events: auto; left: 219.5px; top: 140px; z-index: 10; visibility: visible; perspective: 601px;

iframe.title: il poggiale 3

rs-layer-wrap.style: position: absolute; display: block; pointer-events: none; left: 220px; top: 218px; z-index: 11; visibility: hidden; perspective: 601px;

rs-layer.style: z-index: 11; font-family: Roboto; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-decoration: none; white-space: normal; width: 447px; height: 133px; min-height: 0px; min-width: 0px; max-height: none; max-width: none; text-align: left; line-height: 24px; letter-spacing: 0px; font-weight: 500; font-size: 16px; backdrop-filter: none; filter: none; transform-origin: 50% 50%; opacity: 0; transform: translate(1px, 1px); visibility: visible;

rs-layer-wrap.rs-layer:
A shady reprieve is provided by the Renaissance loggia or portico, from where you can see vistas of the Chianti hills.
The hotel’s ancient central courtyard features roses, hydrangeas and jasmine covering the walls and the old well.
The Wellness Area of the relais hotel is well-thought in order to give moments of relax, completing the pleasure of spending some days among the Chianti hills.

span.span: Using links to videos of high level speakers, included in the online programme of SIF 2021, each member analyses one or two videos and extracts the most relevant key concepts filling a colored sticky notes for each key concept.
Each participant must use his own computer with earphones.
Presentation of the main activities realised during the whole project period
Brainstorming to identify the most important / key messages and contents which can be highlighted in the final Skillnet report

td.style: width: 11.5394%; height: 22px; text-align: center; vertical-align: top;
width: 11.5394%; height: 142px; text-align: center; vertical-align: top;

span.span: Labels indicating Key Concepts are GROUPED under
for designing the final declaration summary and each group is finally identified with a coherent title

span.b: Presentations, reflections and arrangements of tables of contents, lead by each wp leader

p.span: The event is free of charge for members who play an active and relevant role in the field.
p.b: The organisation will cover all costs for accommodation and flight tickets for participants from EU countries only

p.span: To submit your participation request, please follow the website SUBSCRIPTION LINK. In case of approval, you will be contacted by the travel agency to provide you with the travel and accommodation service.

Please note: The organisation cannot refund any money to the beneficiaries. The air ticket will be purchased and offered to the beneficiaries in kind. Please avoid buying the ticket directly as it will not be refunded.

div.p: To have more information, fill the following form:

p.strong: The summit is organized in the framework of Skillnet Project

div.p: Skillnet project – 609063-EPP-1-2019-1-IT-EPPKA3-VET-NETPAR aims at creating and strengthening the capacity building of international networks of VET providers and stakeholders to boost innovation across TVET systems, by promoting novel approaches to skills foresight, upskilling pathways for VET practitioners to design uptodate curricula and the creation of a sustainable forward-looking multistakeholder alliance.
